thread.title: Poonam Pandey strips, takes shower naked in her latest video! - Entertainment
thread.title_full: Poonam Pandey strips, takes shower naked in her latest video! - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Poonam Pandey strips, takes shower naked in her latest video! - Entertainment
text:
Poonam Pandey in a still from her latest video. Pics/YouTube 
Bollywood starlet Poonam Pandey has posted a new steamy video as a treat for fans on the occasion of Valentine's Day.

Poonam Pandey in a still from her latest video 

Poonam Pandey strips, flaunts her cleavage, takes a shower naked and much more in the video that has gone viral on social media.

Poonam Pandey in a still from her latest video 
VIDEO: 

Poonam Pandey says it was her desire to get noticed in a scenario where new actresses were ignored because of 'Khans and Kapoors' which made her become a controversy queen in Indian showbiz.
Her claim to fame was a promise of baring all if India won the Cricket World Cup in 2011.
Poonam is known for posting bold and semi-nude images on her social media accounts.
The actress earlier said she doesn't have a specific dream role, but would love to see herself 'fully covered in a sari and in a ghoonghat'.
